David Shawe is a designer from Northern Ireland.

About Me

I'm a 26 year old designer that loves the web. I was born in 1989, that means I have grown up living with the internet. Since graduating in 2011 I've been working within the "Web Industry", constantly learning and improving my game.

Work

I run my own business and trade as Invisible Building. We sell web to local business and creatives.

Contact

Send mail to david@invisiblebuilding.com
